attributes.action: apply pressure to Colchester Borough Council and Essex County Council to improve pedestrian facilities and lightning along Boxted Road Colchester to improve safety for those attending the Weston Homes Community Stadium on foot.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the opening of the Weston Homes Community Stadium the footpaths and lighting along Boxted Road (the main access for pedestrians) have been shown to be woefully inadequate, putting pedestrians at unnecessary risk when leaving the stadium. Things need to be improved before a tragedy occurs.
